question.xref: DES s6, HC r104, HC r170
question.text: You are waiting at a T-junction. A vehicle is coming from the right with the left signal flashing. What should you do?

explanation.text: Other road users may give misleading signals. When you’re waiting at a junction don’t emerge until you’re sure of their intentions.

answer.text: Wait until the vehicle starts to turn in
Pull out before the vehicle reaches the junction
